text: Kare-ra wa (senji ni) yusei, ressei no joho o eru tabi ni sore o iifurasu. Daga, moshi sore o shito, matawa ken'i o yudane rareta-sha-tachi ni tada shitanara,(tadashi) handan o motometa mono wa sore o shiri etadarou ni. Makotoni arra no onkei to jihi ga, anata gata no ue ni nakattanaraba, wazuka no mono no soto, anata gata wa kitto akuma ni shitagattadearou
